About Talty, Texas
![slogan](https://www.taltytexas.com/upload/page/0173/widgets/image/001499/slogan.png)
Talty incorporated as a general law municipality in 1999 after having been originally established as the Layden Ridge community by Irish settlers. The U. S. Postal Service delivered mail to Michael Talty's general store for distribution.
Located on Interstate 20 twenty miles east of Dallas, Talty has a population of 2700 and is ideally suited to those seeking large residential lots within easy commuting distance to the urban center.
City of Talty, Texas  |  9700 CR 213, Forney TX 75126   |   Phone: 972.552.9592
